main event: An unidentified object was sighted in Encanto, La Mesa, California on June 13, 1956, observed for approximately 3-4 minutes.
interesting points: The object was oval and the size of a basketball., It was incandescent in color and seen at a height of around 60 degrees above the horizon., The sighting occurred near the San Diego destroyer base., The object faded out after the sighting., Ground-visual observations were made without the use of binoculars.
witness description: 1st Lt. Robert L. Larrowe, Duty Director, 721st ACAW Squadron
